Extension Features:

Index F&O Metrics Tracking:
Monitors key metrics such as At-The-Money (ATM) levels, Put/Call (PE/CE) prices, and Implied Volatility (IV).

Intraday PNL Chart:
Provides a detailed intraday Profit and Loss (PNL) chart to track your trading performance in real-time.

Payoff Chart:
Visualizes the potential outcomes of your trades with a detailed payoff chart, helping you plan and strategize effectively.

Margin Calculations for F&O:
Automatically calculates the required margin for your F&O positions, ensuring you have a clear understanding of your capital requirements.

Consolidated F&O Positions:
Aggregates all your F&O positions into a single, comprehensive view, making it easier to monitor and manage your trades.

How to use it.
1. Install the extension.
2. Go to positions tab of zerodha.
3. Incase the extension does not load, hard refresh the page.
